param.name: Convert Height to Geoid Height
param.desc: Convert WGS84 height to geoid height (mean sea level) height

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Address Section
param.desc: Name of the configuration section with modem addresses

param.name: Ignored Interfaces
param.desc: List of interfaces whose services will not be announced

param.name: Loading Order
param.desc: List of messages ordered by loading order

param.name: GSM Address Section
param.desc: Name of the configuration section with gsm modem addresses

param.name: Acoustic Address Section
param.desc: Name of the configuration section with acoustic modem addresses

param.name: Iridium Reports Period
param.desc: Period, in seconds, between transmission of states via Iridium. Value of 0 disables transmission.

param.name: Process AcousticOperation Messages
param.desc: Enable CommManager to process and convert legacy message -> AcousticOperation

param.name: Send Iridium plain texts
param.desc: Send Iridium text messages as plain text (and not IMC)

param.name: Reception timeout
param.desc: Maximum amount of seconds to wait for missing fragments in incoming messages

param.name: Transports
param.default: Chlorophyll, Conductivity, CpuUsage, Current, Depth, Distance, EntityState, Fluorescein, FuelLevel, GpsFix, Heartbeat, LblConfig, LblRange, LblRangeAcceptance, Phycocyanin, Phycoerythrin, PowerChannelState, Pressure, RhodamineDye, RSSI, Rpm, Salinity, SoundSpeed, StorageUsage, Temperature, Turbidity, Voltage, PH, Redox

param.name: Transports
param.default: Announce, Abort, AcousticLink, AlignmentState, EntityParameters, EstimatedState, FollowRefState, FuelLevel, FollowRefState, GpsFix, IridiumTxStatus, PathControlState, PlanControl, PlanControlState, PlanDB, ReportControl, Salinity, SoiCommand, SoiPlan, Temperature, TransmissionStatus, UamRxFrame, UamTxStatus, VehicleMedium, VehicleState

param.name: Filtered Entities
param.desc: List of <Message>:<Entity>+<Entity> that define the source entities allowed to pass message of a specific message type.

param.name: Trace - Incoming Messages
param.desc: Enable verbose output regarding incoming messages

param.name: Trace - Outgoing Messages
param.desc: Enable verbose output regarding outgoing messages

param.name: Announce Service
param.desc: Set to true to announce the service

param.name: Maximum Number of Tries
param.desc: Maximum number of tries for one requested message before throwing error.

param.name: Time Between Tries
param.desc: Time between tries for one requested message.

param.name: Local Port
param.desc: Local UDP port to listen on

param.name: Static Destinations
param.desc: List of <IPv4>:<Port> destinations that will always receive outgoing messages

param.name: Filtered Entities
param.desc: List of <Message>:<Entity>+<Entity> that define the source entities allowed to pass message of a specific message type.

param.name: Announce Service
param.desc: Announce this transport to services or not

param.name: Underwater Communications
param.desc: Allow underwater communication when limited comms are being simulated

param.name: Transports
param.default: Abort, AcousticOperation, AcousticRequest, AcousticStatus, AcousticSystemsQuery, AcousticSystems, CommSystemsQuery, CpuUsage, Current, Depth, Distance, EntityList, EntityParameters, EntityState, EstimatedState, EulerAngles, FuelLevel, GpsFix, Heartbeat, IndicatedSpeed, IridiumMsgRx, IridiumMsgTx, IridiumTxStatus, LblRange, LblRangeAcceptance, LogBookControl, LoggingControl, MagneticField, NavigationUncertainty, PlanControl, PlanControlState, RemoteSensorInfo, RSSI, SetControlSurfaceDeflection, SmsRequest, SmsStatus, StateReport, StorageUsage, TelemetryMsg, Temperature, TextMessage, TransmissionRequest, TransmissionStatus, UamTxFrame, UamRxFrame, UamTxStatus, UamRxRange, UsblAnglesExtended, UsblPositionExtended, UsblFixExtended, UsblModem, UsblConfig, VehicleState, Voltage, VtolState

param.name: Always Transmitted Messages
param.desc: List of messages that will always be transmitted disregarding communication limitations

param.name: Local Messages Only
param.desc: Only transmit messsages from local system.

param.name: Custom Service Type
param.desc: Optional custom service type (imc+udp+<Custom Service Type>), empty entry gives default service (imc+udp)

param.name: Command - On Power Down
param.desc: Command to execute before powering down

param.name: Command - On Power Down Abort
param.desc: Command to execute when powering down sequence is aborted

param.name: System Names
param.default: buv-petinga-1, lauv-seacon-1, lauv-seacon-2, lauv-seacon-3, benthos1, benthos2, benthos3, benthos4, benthos5, benthos6
